snippet.title: The Happy Dismal Town Gameplay (PC - Noir Adventure)
snippet.description:
The Happy Dismal Town Gameplay (PC - Noir Adventure)

Hello everyone, Ceak here. I'm not a talker so it is literally just a gameplay video. If you like the gameplay go check out the game for yourself. The link is at the bottom.

The Happy Dismal Town is a Noir Adventure Game. You arrive in a weird city looking for your detective mentor. Follow the investigation, complete the "Wanted Notice" quests or the side quests to make money and evolve the character and advance the investigation, solve the murders and uncover the horrible secret and fate of the city. The game is being developed by StrangeBoxTales.

Download Here:
https://strangeboxtales.itch.io/the-happy-dismal-town

Check out my Steam profile! https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197992170560/ 

Original Post:
https://www.reddit.com/r/playmygame/comments/qihth2/the_happy_dismal_town_demo/

Instagram Post:
https://www.instagram.com/tv/CWKR6TXF7-o/

All games I post come from https://www.reddit.com/r/playmygame/

The developer is free to contact me for my complete list of thoughts and suggestions.
